      • setFlowControl

        public boolean setFlowControl(int channel,
                     int flowControl)
        Sets flow control to an FTDI chip register
        Parameters:
        channel - CH_A CH_B CH_C CH_D
        flowControl - FTDI_SET_FLOW_CTRL_NONE FTDI_SET_FLOW_RTS_CTS_HS FTDI_SET_FLOW_DTR_DSR_HS FTDI_SET_FLOW_XON_XOFF_HS
        Returns:
        true : succeed, false : not succeed

      • setSerialPropertyToChip

        public boolean setSerialPropertyToChip(int channel)
        Sets the serial properties to an FTDI chip register
        Parameters:
        channel - CH_A CH_B CH_C CH_D
        Returns:
        true : succeed, false : not succeed

      • setSerialPropertyDataBit

        public boolean setSerialPropertyDataBit(int numOfDataBit,
                               int channel)
        Sets the serial property of data bit
        Parameters:
        numOfDataBit - : number of data bit(8 or 7)
        channel - CH_A CH_B CH_C CH_D
        Returns:
        true : succeed, false : not succeed

      • setSerialPropertyParity

        public boolean setSerialPropertyParity(int parity,
                              int channel)
        Sets the serial property of parity bit
        Parameters:
        parity - none : FTDI_SET_DATA_PARITY_NONE odd : FTDI_SET_DATA_PARITY_ODD even : FTDI_SET_DATA_PARITY_EVEN mark : FTDI_SET_DATA_PARITY_MARK space : FTDI_SET_DATA_PARITY_SPACE
        channel - CH_A CH_B CH_C CH_D
        Returns:
        true : succeed, false : not succeed

      • setSerialPropertyStopBits

        public boolean setSerialPropertyStopBits(int stopBits,
                                int channel)
        Sets the serial property of stop bits
        Parameters:
        stopBits - 1 : FTDI_SET_DATA_STOP_BITS_1 1.5 : FTDI_SET_DATA_STOP_BITS_15 2 : FTDI_SET_DATA_STOP_BITS_2
        channel - CH_A CH_B CH_C CH_D
        Returns:
        true : succeed, false : not succeed

      • setSerialPropertyBreak

        public boolean setSerialPropertyBreak(int tx,
                             int channel)
        Sets the serial property of TX ON/OFF
        Parameters:
        tx - TX OFF : FTDI_SET_NOBREAK TX ON : FTDI_SET_BREAK
        channel - CH_A CH_B CH_C CH_D
        Returns:
        true : succeed, false : not succeed
